userParams.name: Datadog Tags
userParams.info: Comma Delimited, adds important metadata to your performance data

userParams.name: Call Check Frequency
userParams.info: Frequency that the device will check if there is an active call to monitor

userParams.name: In-Call Collection Frequency
userParams.info: Frequency that the device will collect data if there is an active call to monitor

userParams.name: General Collection Frequency
userParams.info: Frequency that the device will collect general device status data

userParams.name: Monitor Peripherals
userParams.info: Do you want to monitor the connection status of peripheral devices
